Class Reporting

java.lang.Object
Reporting
public class Reporting
extends java.lang.Object
This is a class for representing a Map with all District Names and its values. It has methods to set

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Reporting()
    Initializing the Map districts.
    Reporting​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​District> districts)
    This is the constructor of Reporting class.It creates a map with Districts and its Incidents.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addIncident​(java.lang.String district, Incident incident)
    This is a method which adds an Incident to a District from District List.
    void distToMap​(java.lang.String name, District district)
    This method adds a District with its Incidents to Map districts.
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​District> getDistricts()  
    void largestAv()
    This method prints the average value for a given year from the user.
    void largestValInc()
    This method prints the largest Incident value from the Map districts.
    void listAllIncGreater()
    This method prints the List with Incidents greater than a given amount of money from the user.
    java.lang.String toString()
    This returns a human readable version of our object (Reporting)

      incident - Is the Incident to add in the list of Incidents in District.

      public void distToMap​(java.lang.String name, District district)
      This method adds a District with its Incidents to Map districts.
      Parameters:
      name - Represents the name of the District.
      district - Is the District with its Incidents.
